```{r, echo = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warnings = FALSE, message = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(shiny)
```

```{r}
ballon_dor <- read_csv("BallonDOr.csv")

nationalities <- pull(ballon_dor, Nationality) |>
  unique() |>
  na.omit()

years <- pull(ballon_dor, Year) |>
  unique() |>
  na.omit()

scatter_plot <- function(df) {
  p <- ggplot(mapping = aes(Player, Rank)) +
    geom_point(data = df |> filter(selected), size = 2, alpha = 1)
}

ui <- fluidPage(
  titlePanel("Ballon D'Or Rankings"),
  sliderInput("Year", "Year", min = min(ballon_dor$Year), max = max(ballon_dor$Year), c(1950, 2020), sep="")
)
```
